name: SCNFilterMode
desc: Texture filtering modes, used by the minificationFilter, magnificationFilter, and mipFilter properties.

items.name: case nearest
items.desc: Texture filtering returns the color from only one texel, whose location is nearest to the coordinates being sampled.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: Texture filtering sample texels from the neighborhood of the coordinates being sampled and linearly interpolates their colors.
